actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, to provide funds to conduct a study of the effects of the red tide on human health.
subjects: Department of Health, Education, and Welfare

summary.text: Makes a supplemental appropriation of $187,500 for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for fiscal year 1975, to provide funds to conduct a study of the effects of the red tide on human health.

titles.title: A bill making a supplemental appropriation for the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1975, to provide funds to conduct a study of the effects of the red tide on human health.
